body:
## Release Notes

- Add CODEOWNERS and settings.yml files. @iphydf (#20)
- Upgrade dependencies to their latest versions. @iphydf (#19)
- Enable .travis.yml check and use non-markdown license. @iphydf (#18)
- Change bintray license to GPL-3.0. @iphydf (#17)
- Add a bazel test that ensures all our projects are GPL-3.0. @iphydf (#16)
- Relicense under GPLv3. @iphydf (#15)
- Remove unused (or used-once) plugins from sbt-plugins. @iphydf (#14)
- Remove javaOptions from makeScripts task. @iphydf (#13)
- Update protobuf java version to 3.5.0. @iphydf (#12)
- Remove support for native code compilation in sbt. @iphydf (#11)
- Use official markdown license for AGPLv3. @iphydf (#10)
- Don't use `git.depth=1` anymore. @iphydf (#9)
- Only fetch 1 revision from git during Travis builds. @iphydf (#6)
- Pass dependency includes as `-isystem`. @iphydf (#7)
- Fix java.library.path in tests. @iphydf (#5)
- Don't reorder sections in the readme dependency updater. @iphydf (#4)
- Implement readme dependency list update plugin. @iphydf (#3)
- Update for new SBT API. @iphydf (#2)
- Remove -lpthread and any -L flags from pkg-config libs. @iphydf (#1)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Set up CI using GitHub Actions @robinlinden (#23)
